评论详情: Exactly what I was looking for. Fits well. Love it.

Bought this top with the idea to wear it for Halloween this year, and I’m actually going to keep it for my regular wardrobe! Fit comfortably, good quality and soft!  I have a pretty large chest, so it was also a pretty large shock when I put it on and it didn’t immediately ride up.

Love the Victorian design, unfortunately the bodice is made of a cheap polyester fabric. The black lace around the collar, back, chest & shoulder area, and bottom edges was the only exception. I ordered a large but could’ve very well have been a medium. Disappointed.

It's a pretty top, however they run small. I wear a size small but ordered up as per reviews,  it is still snug (asian sizes). Going bigger would make the blouse too long.  Also there is nothing to hold together the area around the neck. I'll have to figure something out to add to the area to keep it together.It's for Halloween so I'm keep it,  if not I would've definitely returned it.
I own a few scarlett darkness shirts and get compliments on every single one. I just wish they weren’t so pricy.

This shirt does have some stretch to it so if you're on the fence, I'd go down.  It's quality.  I've washed it twice and it has held up great.  On a 5'10" frame at 120 lbs the small was perfect.  Beautifully made and up close looks really expensive.  The style is really unique!  I'm happy with this purchase...totally!
I like the look, though the fit is very snug.  Fortunately the material is stretchy.  While one would hope that flatter the bosom, it seems more to accentuate the belly rolls.

Very beautiful blouse. My only complaint is that the buttons are just for show, so it felt more like a costume vs. an everyday blouse. However, this is not a cheaply made blouse. The construction is very nice, and the blouse is comfortable. I will be buying more from this company!!

Beautiful top! I thought this was going to have a more of a corseted fit to it, but I am so glad it does not. Very soft satin like material, good quality and easy care instructions. I'm 5'2" 100lbs and I ordered a small.  It fits great and the lace does not pick at my sensitive skin.

My wife recently received a role in "The Scarlet Pimpernel" (this is a play for those of you who don't know) and for part of her costume, they gave her one of these shirts to wear. She requested that I buy her one in a smaller size since all the ones they had in the wardrobe were too large....now I know why.  We ordered the smallest size available and it was still too large. Additionally, the fabric/style does not do very well with curves. My wife has a a very small waist with fairly prominent hip bones and the way the bottom of this top laid over her hips was not very flattering. She wound up shortening the top by about 1.5 inches to allow for it to lay better.  I totally would have returned this if she didn't need it for the play.
